
    Part of the glew-cmake project
    
    (c)2013 Brian Sidebotham <brian.sidebotham@gmail.com>
    
    This is a GLEW example CMake project which makes use of the ExternalProject
    module that ships with CMake 2.8.
    
    This builds visualinfo using GLEW from an ExternalProject ( The GLEW source
    archive tarball ) as a dependancy.
